subject: Wages and Salaries
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Major League Soccer said Thursday that it was expanding the designated player rule — the so-called Beckham rule — to give clubs the chance to sign two players above the M.L.S. salary cap.
snippet: Major League Soccer said Thursday that it was expanding the designated player rule — the so-called Beckham rule — to give clubs the chance to sign two players above the M.L.S. salary cap.
